landing.header__title: ELYFI the first real estate collateralized, decentralized lending protocol
landing.header__content: ELYFI provides digital asset loans by converting real estate into NFTs and using it as collateral

section.header: Deposit digital assets and receive APR and additional rewards
section.content: By staking into the ELYFI money pool, participants obtain voting rights regarding the protocol and receive rewards for participation

section.header: ELYFI facilitates real estate backed NFTs so that digital asset loans can be more efficient!
section.content: The protocol provides opportunity for borrowers and lenders who are looking to avoid volatility and liquidation risk crypto lending markets.

section.header: ELFI holders decide matters related to the protocol
section.content: Important decisions such as loan executions and interest rate are voted by the community through on-chain and off-chain governance.
Depositors can obtain stable interest because loans are made with real world assets such as real estate-based loans as collateral.
ELFI token holders can directly participate in the forum or make decisions on important issues through voting.
High returns can be obtained by distributing protocol revenue and governance tokens.
There is no limit on the amount of deposit, and even a small amount can be deposited in ELYFI
There are no signup requirements, so anyone in the world can use it.
Information on collateral and the loan process for virtual assets are transparently disclosed

ELFI token holders can participate in the operation of ELYFI as a member of the DAO.

staking__notice.ELFI:
{{ stakedToken }} Staking will be carried out in seven separate sessions according to the {{ rewardToken }} mining plan.
Staking {{ stakedToken }}  tokens reward ELYFI governance token({{ rewardToken }}), and the staked {{ stakedToken }} tokens can be unstaken at any time.

* In addition, {{ stakedToken }} tokens staked in the previous round and the rewarded {{ rewardToken }} tokens are not automatically sent to the next staking pool.
staking__notice.DAI:
{{ stakedToken }} Staking will be carried out in seven separate sessions according to the {{ rewardToken }} mining plan.
Staking {{ stakedToken }} tokens reward the {{ rewardToken }} tokens, and the staked {{ stakedToken }} tokens can be unstaken at any time.

* In addition, {{ stakedToken }} tokens staked in the previous round and the rewarded {{ rewardToken }} tokens are not automatically sent to the next staking pool.
staking__notice.BUSD:
{{ stakedToken }} Staking will be carried out in two separate sessions according to the {{ rewardToken }} mining plan.
Staking {{ stakedToken }} tokens reward the {{ rewardToken }} tokens, and the staked {{ stakedToken }} tokens can be unstaken at any time.

* In addition, {{ stakedToken }} tokens staked in the previous round and the rewarded {{ rewardToken }} tokens are not automatically sent to the next staking pool.

staking.current_round_null: There is no current rounds in progress.

el.staking__content: Stake EL tokens and get reward tokens, ELFI!

elfi.staking__content:
Stake ELFI tokens and get governance tokens(ELFI) and voting rights!
ELFI holders can participate in decentralized governance(DAO) by staking their ELFI.

token_staking--content: {{stakedToken}} Staking will be carried out in four separate sessions according to the {{rewardToken}} mining plan.
Staking {{stakedToken}} tokens reward the {{rewardToken}} tokens, and the staked {{stakedToken}} tokens can be unstaken at any time.
In addition, {{stakedToken}} tokens staked in the previous round and the rewarded {{rewardToken}} tokens are not automatically sent to the next staking pool.
You can check detailed mining plan
staking.nth_staking_round_ended:
{{nth}} round has ended.
You will be taken to the staking page.
staking.migration--content: Migration' is a function that automatically transfers the staked amount excluding the unstaked amount to the current staking pool for staking. Because unstaking and migration are performed at the same time, you can save gas fees for using the Ethereum network.
staking.nth_ended_alert: The {{nth}}th round has ended, and migration is not possible. Do you want to proceed?
staking.all_ended_alert: All of the rounds for staking are currently over and migration is not possible.
staking.error_description_one: The requested transaction failed due to an error in Metamask. Please contact cs@elysia.land by copying the error code/message below.
staking.error_description_two: The requested transaction has failed. Please contact cs@elysia.land by copying the error code/message below.

portfolio.abtoken_content:
ABToken is a non-fungible token(NFT) minted based on a loan bond formed in a loan agreement beteween Elyloan corp, a lending company, and the property owner.
ABToken proves the ownership of the underlying loan bond, and the owner with the token can borrow crypto assets using it as collateral in ELYFI.
infomation_popup: Meaning a code when a loan occurs in ELYFI Money Pool.
A loan not repayed until the last date of the grace period, 10 days after a maturity date
A loan that has been repaid and ended its loan relationship
Meaning a non-fungible token(NFT) used as a collateral to get loans from ELYFI
Meaning a loan instrument (such as mortgage) in a contract between a lending company and a property owner.
Meaning a collateral (such as apartments) in a contract between a lending company and a property owner.

indicator.loading_metamask: Confirm this transaction in your wallet
indicator.loading_approve: An approvement transaction is being processed.

permission.title: Approve the access
permission.content--deposit: In order to deposit to the money pool, you need to approve access so that the app can access the connected wallet. Approval is required only at the time of initial deposit, and upon successful completion of the approvement, deposits can be made without subsequent approval process.
permission.content--staking: In order to stake to the money pool, you need to approve access so that the app can access the connected wallet. Approval is required only at the time of initial staking, and upon successful completion of the approvement, staking can be made without subsequent approval process.
permission.comment: * Approval of access rights is also a transaction using the network, so gas charges occur.

connect_wallet.content:
A wallet connection is required to use ELYFI.
Do you want to connect?

connect_metamask.title: Start ELYFI
connect_metamask.content: A related function will be opened soon so that you can use deposit/withdrawal and staking on the mobile web page!

wrong_mainnet.title: Wrong Network
wrong_mainnet.content:
The currently connected wallet is connected to a network not provided by ELYFI.
Please change to Ethereum or BSC network!

network_change.title: Change network
network_change.content:
The wallet is connected to a network not provided by ELYFI.
Please select the desired network among the networks below and change it!

claim_disable.title: Disable button
claim_disable.content: The reward claim function has been temporarily disabled due to an error inquiry about the migration function, which is currently provided for convenience.

migration_disable.title: Disable migration
migration_disable.content:
Migration function is disabled.
When participating in the 7th staking, please stake in the 7th pool after unstaking.

wallet_change_netwrok.title: Network Error
wallet_change_netwrok.content:
To use {{network}} in ELYFI, please select the network
in your wallet and connect your wallet again!
wallet_change_netwrok.subContent: (Please check if the connected wallet supports the network.)

guide.apr: APR is an abbreviation of Annual percentage rate, which means the ratio of the total compensation amount to the total liquidity.
guide.total_liquidity: Total liquidity means the total amount deposited in the ELFI-{{token}} pool among the information of the staked LP tokens expressed in dollars.
guide.create_liquidity: ELFI-{{token}} LP tokens are NFTs you receive when you provide liquidity to the ELFI-{{token}} pool created in Uniswap V3. You can stake LP with the corresponding LP Token.
guide.staked_total_amount: The liquidity of the LP tokens staked with the connected wallet is expressed in dollars.
guide.staked_lp_token: This is a list of LP tokens staked with the connected wallet. The expected reward represents the amount of rewards that can be obtained by staking each LP token. In order to receive the rewards, you must first unstake the corresponding LP tokens. You can check the reward tokens available for unstaking LP tokens in the ‘Amount of reward’ area located at the bottom. After clicking the ‘Claim rewards’ button, follow the procedure to complete the rewards collection.
guide.receive_reward: If you unstake the staked LP token, the amount of reward tokens for that LP token is displayed. Click the 'Claim rewards' button to receive the reward, and the reward token will be sent to the connected wallet.
